title: Located in the Telecom corridor
posting_body: ['Text :9947A  for more info!', 'Welcome to The West Village Uptown', 'The West Village Uptown is a high-end apartment community spread into two separate parcels, The Flats and The Lofts, and offers a blend of luxury and urban excitement.', "You’ll live in the center of Uptown in the West Village district, one of Dallas's most vibrant neighborhoods with access to over 100 popular restaurants, retailers, and entertainment options.", 'After you’ve enjoyed the city excitement, you’ll come home to your perfect, private oasis, with everything you need to relax and unwind.', 'You’ll enjoy living in one of The Lofts 27 different floor plans of one and two bedroom homes ranging from 593 to 1,405 square feet.', 'With our several layout options and high-end designs, there’s something for everyone, and every space offers a custom and luxury living experience.', 'Each home includes an in-unit washer and dryer, hardwood floors, linen closets, two-inch faux-wood blinds, and kitchens with a complete appliance package.', 'Additional features like quartz countertops, tile backsplash, under-mount single-basin sinks, high-end contemporary fixtures, ten-foot-tall ceilings, and a garden tub further elevate your space.', 'Our community also offers resort-style amenities that cater to your everyday routine and provide an array of activities right outside your door.', 'Start every day right by getting a delicious beverage at our complimentary coffee/tea bar.', 'Get in a great workout at our 24-hour state-of-the-art fitness center with weight machines and cardio equipment.', 'Or enjoy lounging by our outdoor swimming pool and cooking a delicious BBQ meal at our adjacent grilling stations.', 'Both of our buildings are also pet-friendly and offer parking garages, Luxer One Package lockers, and are controlled-access.', 'The Loft is located at  McKinney Avenue Dallas, TX 75204, right off I-75, providing a less than five-minute commute to downtown Dallas.', 'Professionals will appreciate living less than nine miles away from the area’s eight major employment hubs, including the Telecom Corridor, Preston Center, and the Platinum Corridor.', 'Additionally, you’ll be less than four miles away from twelve world-class entertainment venues, including the Dallas Arts District, Victory Park, and The Shops at Park Lane.', 'These areas are even more accessible with convenient connectivity to public transportation, including the DART Rail and the Historic McKinney Avenue Trolley.', 'The Uptown neighborhood also provides a Walk Score of 93, and scenic attractions like Katy Trail, Oak Lawn Park, and Turtle Creek are less than a ten-minute walk away.', 'The Loft offers outstanding amenities, luxurious homes, and spectacular surroundings near all of Dallas’s greatest attractions.', 'If you’d like to experience what life is like at The Sawyer, then contact our friendly and knowledgeable staff today!', 'We’d be happy to schedule you a personal tour and answer all of your questions.', 'We can’t wait to welcome you home to The West Village Uptown in Dallas, TX!']
